text: O Objetivo meupacote0522 é ajudar os queridos alunos desenvolver pacotes R.

title: Exemplos do curso de pacotes da curso-R
text: can install development version meupacote0522 GitHub :

title: Exemplos do curso de pacotes da curso-R
text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . also use GitHub Actions re-render README.Rmd every time push. example workflow can found : https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/v1/examples. can also embed plots, example:  case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(meupacote0522) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: Calcular media do volume — media_vol
code: media_vol("Cantareira") #> i Using "','" as decimal and "'.'" as grouping mark. Use `read_delim()` for more control. #> Rows: 50696 Columns: 8 #> -- Column specification -------------------------------------------------------- #> Delimiter: ";" #> chr  (1): sistema #> dbl  (6): volume_porcentagem, volume_variacao, volume_operacional, pluviomet... #> date (1): data #>  #> i Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. #> i Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message. #> # A tibble: 1 x 4 #>   sistema      ano   mes media_volume_porcentagem #>   <chr>      <dbl> <dbl>                    <dbl> #> 1 Cantareira  2022     4                     44.9
